About

I am Baran Kucukguzel, a software engineer at MilSOFT Software Technologies Inc and a MSc candidate at Middle East Technical University - Department of Computer Engineering . I work on MilSOFT DDS which is a nationally leading implementation of the ￼ Object Management Group (OMG)'s Data Distribution Service (DDS) messaging ￼ standard for both enterprise and real-time systems as my full time job.

This is my personal blog where I mostly write about on technical stuff.
